attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are private landlord rents not looked into and kept inline with council rents, Landlords can charge what they like and make vast amounts of money from people who cannot afford it,Nobody can get a coucil house anymore and certanly cannot buy so you are stuck with private landlords, 
Rents use to be regulated by the council years ago and i think it is time for that to be brought back.
